QuestData.Title: Antivenin
QuestData.Description: I'm worried about Nyami. She's so focused on retrieving the Heart of Auchindoun that she seems to have lost sight of everything else.$B$BI'm sorry, I'm not trying to belittle her wisdom, but look around! Every soldier we sent into the mine has been gravely injured by the deathweb spiders. Their wounds need immediate attention!$B$BPlease, can you retrieve some fangs from the spiders? I can use them to create an antivenin, but I need to stay here and keep them stable until then.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Deathweb Fangs in Deathweb Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Bless you, $n. There have been enough innocent lives taken today.
